name: The Falling Pig
description:
History

Felix is the first pig in the world to have launched itself from the isosphere, from an altitude of 130.00 feet.
If we don't help him, he'll crash.

Mechanics and controls

:: For smartphone ::
Tilt the phone to move Felix and tap on objects to move or destroy them.
:: For keyboard ::
Directional arrows for movement and mouse to touch objects

The mechanics of the game are similar to doodle jump but here, instead of jumping, you fall.
Between levels, some drawings will give you tips to survive and to get to know Felix better....

Levels

There are 27 levels.
In this demo you will be able to try the first nine levels and try to defeat a boss. Soon, 18 more levels and 2 bosses.
